meanings.definition: A metric unit of mass equal to 1,000 kilograms.
meanings.sent1: A tonne is a measurement used in many countries.
meanings.sent2: The shipment weighed one tonne, which was quite heavy.
meanings.sent3: When the elephant sat on the scale, it read one tonne!
meanings.sent4: The tonne of bricks felt like a mountain on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The tonne of feathers seemed to float effortlessly in the air.
